message.content:
I need to identify the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period from the given income statement.

In accounting, the "carrying amount of inventories sold" refers to the cost of inventory that was sold during the period, which is typically represented by the "Cost of Goods Sold" line item in the income statement.

Looking at the provided income statement for 2024-02-01, I can see the following line:
| Cost of Goods Sold | 562950.00 | 2024-02-01 |

This represents the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period. 

Therefore, the value is 562950.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '562950.00'} }
```
